metadata.title: CVE-2021-3572 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in python-pip in the way it handled Unicode separators ingit references. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to installa different revision on a repository. The highest threat from thisvulnerability is to data integrity. This is fixed in python-pip version21.1.

criterions.comment: python-pip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
